info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 17 at 11:52PM CDT until July 18 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LOGAN...SOUTH CENTRAL JOHNSON...NORTHWESTERN YELL AND SOUTHWESTERN POPE COUNTIES... At 1152 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tokalon to Midway in Logan County to near Paris, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Clarksville... Paris... Danville... Dardanelle... London... Knoxville... Subiaco... Scranton... Lake Dardanelle State Park... Mt Nebo State Park... Hoyt... Mount Magazine... Lake Dardanelle... Midway in Logan County... Spadra... Mosley... Tokalon... Belleville... Havana... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 65 and 77. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
